text: he manushyon! apane[1] us paalanahaar se daro, jisane tumhen ek jeev (aadam) se utpann kiya tatha useese usakee patnee (havva) ko utpann kiya aur un donon se bahut-se nar-naaree phaila diye. us allaah se daro, jisake dvaara tum ek-doosare se (adhikaar) maangate ho tatha rakt sambandhon ko todane se daro. nihsandeh allaah tumhaara nireekshak hai
